articles.content: The PGA tour heads to Detroit Golf Club for the Rocket Mortgage Classic on Thursday. The field will feature plenty of high profile contenders including, Patrick Cantlay, Will Zalatoris, Cameron Young… [+8208 chars]

articles.author: Matias Grez, CNN
articles.title: England's women reach Euro 2022 final with stunning win over Sweden - CNN
articles.description: England's women banished the heartbreak of their two recent major semifinal defeats by beating Sweden 4-0 to reach the final of Euro 2022.

articles.author: Jack Bezants
articles.title: A 29-year-old soccer player dies after being assaulted in a brawl at Oxnard High School - Daily Mail
articles.description: Misael Sanchez, 29, was, according to Oxnard Police, assaulted by several people when a fight broke out during a match in California on July 10.
articles.content:
A soccer player has died two weeks after being assaulted in a fight between players and spectators at Oxnard High School in California.
Misael Sanchez, 29, was, according to Oxnard Police, assaulted… [+1343 chars]
